workshoptitle: Oracle Enterprise Manager - Automated Database Upgrade at Scale with Fleet Maintenance

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Automated Database Upgrade at Scale with Fleet Maintenance Workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Automated Database Upgrade at Scale with Fleet Maintenance
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps needed with Fleet Maintenance to automate upgrade of wide range of DB Configurations including Oracle RAC environments with Data Guard Standby

tutorials.title: Appendix: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
tutorials.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) you may refer to when troubleshooting issues encountered while executing above labs

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
